title: Client Issue
body:
Playing a Ranked Game.
Game actually *freezes* and boots me out of game and client. On trying to restart the client, the client goes into update mode.
Needless to say, by the time *that* process started, the game could not be re-entered.

WTH?
At this point, I'm beyond even asking for a Forgiven.. I just want to know how/why such a thing would occur.

replies.body:
I took a look into this and it appears *Rineyy* may be correct. From what I see, it looks like you may have been forced into restarting the client for the Hotfix that rolled out last night to address some known issues some players were experiencing. The game should ne unrecorded in your match history or should have ended in a draw.

Let me know if you have any further questions.
I was actually playing when the Hotfix was deployed and didn't experience a crash or disconnection. The game finished smoothly and was recorded as well.

A fix was just released to address the loading screen crash bug - which is why you had to download a patch.

If you're experiencing crashes in-game, I recommend ridding yourself of the pests which harass your gameplay by using the [Bug & Crash Exterminator.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) Kha’Zix and Elise won’t know what hit ‘em.
